stimulusHtml: As the spacecraft approaches, which of the following describes the change in gravitational potential energy Δ U g of the asteroids-spacecraft system, and includes a correct justification?

features.html: A small spacecraft approaches the midpoint between two large asteroids that are far from any other objects. There is zero thrust exerted on the spacecraft from the spacecraft’s engines. The mass of each asteroid is much greater than that of the spacecraft and the distance between the asteroids remains constant.

choicesHtml: ΔUg decreases because the gravitational force of each asteroid does negative work on the spacecraft.
ΔUg decreases because the gravitational force of each asteroid does positive work on the spacecraft.
ΔUg increases because the gravitational force of each asteroid does positive work on the spacecraft.
ΔUg increases because the gravitational force of each asteroid does negative work on the spacecraft.
